problem.markdown:
>> Which of the following is an example of closed loop control<< ( ) A valve getting signal from controller to maintain temperature depending on the temperature sensed by the sensor ( ) A car driven by a drive (x) Both a and b
[explanation] Give Explanation [explanation]
problem.p: Which of the following is an example of closed loop control

choicegroup.label: Which of the following is an example of closed loop control
choicegroup.choice: A valve getting signal from controller to maintain temperature depending on the temperature sensed by the sensor
A car driven by a drive
